column3: Latest;Svay Rieng: Three Vietnamese suspects were detained ------and sent to the court on October 18
column5: in Svay Rieng province after they were caught with 404 packets of illegal drug in  their possession------ ------According to sources
column6: the three suspects were: ------1. Phien Thi Thoi
column7: a 43-year-old Vietnamese from Oantyi in Ben Hue district
column11: a 55-year-old Vietnamese immigrant ------3. Ma Ying Long
column12: a 52-year-old Vietnamese residing in Loong Long village
column14: Vietnam.------A total of 104.85 grams (in packets) were seized.       ------Source DAP NEWS
